snippet.title: Super Smash Bros Brawl - Classic Mode - Mario
snippet.description:
This is Part 1 of the Super Smash Bros Brawl Classic Mode gameplay walkthrough for the Nintendo Wii.

I'll be going through Classic Mode with all characters including Wolf, Toon Link & Jigglypuff! I wanted to play this on Intense Difficulty, but I figured out videos would be too long. The other difficulties (Very Hard, Hard & Normal) didn't take as long as Intense did, but they still took 15-30 minutes, and I didn't want you to watch 30 minutes of gameplay when it can be done faster.
Result: I put the game on Easy, HOWEVER, I'll do at least 1 round at Hard, Very Hard or Intense in order to show both of the final bosses: Master Hand & Crazy Hand.

0:00 Classic Mode - Mario
11:56 Classic Mode - Final Boss

The shooting-credits are cut out to save time.

Sunny Crappy on Twitter: twitter.com/sunnycrappys
